name: Casa Cuevas - Sangre Nueva - Double Perfecto
additionalNotes: The Casa Cuevas Sangre Nueva is the first blend released by Alec Cuevas. He is the grandson of Luis Cuevas Sr., who is the founder of the Casa Cuevas brand. Alec is the fifth generation of this family owned and operated cigar company. Alec dedicated the Sangre Nueva brand to his family for having faith in him as he crafted his first cigar. The cigar is medium to full-bodied, and it features a red-hued Cameroon wrapper that cloaks a Corojo binder, and a filler made of Nicaraguan, Dominican and Pennsylvania Broadleaf tobaccos. The cigars are made in the Dominican Republic at the familyâ€™s Tabacalera Las Lavas factory.
